product_name: Minoura W-3100 Bike Repair Stand with Tool Tray
long_description: The Minoura W-3100 bike stand is for home mechanics. It's made from heavy-duty steel for years of reliable service. Widely spanned legs offer a stable platform; legs fold up for easy storage. Bike clamps in with an easy-to-use, single-action lever; clamp jaws micro adjust for the perfect fit. Clamp jaws rotate 360deg and can be set every 15deg to hold the bike at your favorite job angle. Tool tray is set at the mid pillar joint and swivels for easy tool access. Expanded dimensions:57(h) x 25.6 (w) x 23.6 (d) in.
short_description: The Minoura W-3100 bike stand is for home mechanics. It's made from heavy-duty steel for years of reliable service.
